segments.text: Chinese , maths , English , chemistry , physics , biology and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think about the teachers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I like most of them , except for my Chinese teacher . She is quite young , but her class is too boring !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad . Do you have any foreign teachers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my oral English teacher is an American . He is from a small town in California .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is great . He always tells us not to study for exams , and to pay more attention to communication rather than just memorizing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you able to follow him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not everything , but nearly . He speaks very clearly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's good ! He sounds like a good teacher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely ! If you come to our class , I am sure you will like him .
segments.speaker: S2
